meanings.definition: The state or quality of being young.
meanings.sent1: Her youngness was evident in her playful demeanor.
meanings.sent2: The youngness of the puppy was apparent in its boundless energy.
meanings.sent3: The youngness of the kitten made everyone smile with its antics.
meanings.sent4: The youngness of the sapling symbolized new beginnings and growth.
meanings.sent5: The youngness of the colt was a sight to behold, full of promise and vitality.

meanings.definition: The time of life when one is young.
meanings.sent1: During her youngness, she explored the world with wonder and curiosity.
meanings.sent2: The youngness of childhood is a time of innocence and joy.
meanings.sent3: The youngness of the students was evident in their excitement for the field trip.
meanings.sent4: The youngness of spring brings new life and vibrant colors to the world.
meanings.sent5: The youngness of the foal was a reminder of the beauty of youth and freedom.
